properties.description: i18n:Template for configuring CI/CD pipeline for Azure IoT Edge App using .NET Core

taskInputs.inlineScript: (az extension add --name azure-cli-iot-ext && az iot hub device-identity show --device-id myEdgeDevice --hub-name {{{inputs.iotHubName}}}) || (az iot hub device-identity create --hub-name {{{inputs.iotHubName}}} --device-id myEdgeDevice --edge-enabled && TMP_OUTPUT="$(az iot hub device-identity show-connection-string --device-id myEdgeDevice --hub-name {{{inputs.iotHubName}}})" && RE="\"cs\":\s?\"(.*)\"" && if [[ $TMP_OUTPUT =~ $RE ]]; then CS_OUTPUT=${BASH_REMATCH[1]}; fi && echo "##vso[task.setvariable variable=CS_OUTPUT]${CS_OUTPUT}")

properties.name: i18n:Simple IoT App
properties.description: i18n:A fully managed service that delivers cloud intelligence locally on cross-platform IoT devices

properties.name: i18n:IoT Hub with simulated device
properties.description: i18n:Create a new IoT Hub and Ubuntu Server 16.04 LTS amd64 virtual machine as a simulated Edge device

properties.name: i18n:IoT Hub with existing device
properties.description: i18n:Create a new IoT Hub, choose this when you already have an existing Edge device
